item.title: Golang Image Resize and Golang Image Crop: Image Manipulation With Go Programming Language
item.description: Golang Image Resize & Golang Image Crop In general, I believe most people will want to use a dedicated package to really make this powerful but I wanted to write a bit about my experience with resizing images in Golang. Before I go any further, here are a few resources I used to learn more about image processing for my own purposes. How to Crop image in Golang? https://stackoverflow.com/questions/22940724/go-resizing-images Go Image Package Go Image/Draw Package

item.title: Golang Read Environment Variables From File: How To Do It [Code Snippets]
item.description: What Are Environmental Variables In Go A Cautionary Tale: My AWS Account Was Hacked And I Have A $50,000 Bill If you have ever used an API key or database connection string, you have most likely had a need to secure some sensitive data. Environment variables are a way to achieve this. We may need to do this because certain API’s can only be called so many times and the key is a way of authorizing our requests and keeping track of them.
